title: Large, charming 2bd / 1ba in Hawthorne
description:
This is a large 2 bedroom, 1 bath third-floor apartment near 12th and Christian in Hawthorne. Available now.
Beautiful living room looks out on a tree-lined street. Kitchen and bathroom were redone a few years ago and have all new appliances, including a washer/dryer.
One bedroom has two giant southern-facing windows and gets amazing light. The other is smaller and is currently being used as an office, but could accommodate a queen-sized bed. Both bedrooms have tons of closet space, and there's more in the living room and hallway.
Gas heat from hot water radiators. Three window unit A/Cs are included.
One cat is allowed. No dogs.
I'm the current tenant of this apartment, posting on my landlord's behalf.
Please email with any questions or to set up a showing.

title: ONE-OF-A-KIND VICTORIAN, SPLENDID LIGHT! PETS WELCOME!
description:
This updated one-bedroom, one-bath apartment features a great layout with front and back entrances, a shady front porch, and plenty of light. The apartment includes 9ft. ceilings, ceiling fans, washer and dryer hookups, a new well-equipped stainless kitchen (with gas stove and dishwasher), crown moldings, custom paint, original oak hardwood floors, and off-street parking. The building has front and back yards with graceful, mature landscaping. If you have a green thumb, you can plant veggies and flowers in the raised-bed garden spots. Tired of all those cookie-cutter "housing units"? This is a unique accommodation that you will be proud to call "home"!
Hatfield has miles of leafy park trails, lively community events, fantastic splash park and pool, three off-leash dog parks, and an award-winning school district. This is a small town with big heart!

title: Looking for a third roommate !
description:
Hi everyone! Two roommates are looking for someone to fill a bedroom in our East Kensington apartment. We’ve lived here just about a year, and it’s been great. There’s plenty of space, a giant roof deck, and it’s only a block away from the York/Dauphin stop on the El, so getting around the city is super easy. Parking is never a problem either. The open bedroom is on the first floor and has a cute balcony. Your bathroom is right outside the bedroom. Rent is $1000 a month + utilities so altogether it’s ~$1000. Move in would be July 1, but we can try and work with you if you’re looking to make an earlier move.
About us: We are two young professionals in our twenties! Mollie is a teacher and MaryBeth works at a local radio station. Mollie loves to bake so we always have plenty of cookies to try ;) We also have a cat named Uno, so no new pets!

title: 2 Bed Apt, Bella Vista/Italian Market, Avail August 1st, 2022
description:
2 Bed Apt, Bella Vista/Italian Market, Avail August 1st, 2022
Recently renovated 2-bedroom, 900 sq ft, 3rd floor apartment w/ private 2nd FL landing (for bikes, coats, etc).    1148 S 10th St (near corner of 10th and Ellsworth).   $1450/month (tenant pays gas and electric, which are very low; landlord pays for water usage).
Amenities include: Central ac and heat (high-efficiency), exposed brick (in living room, kitchen, bathroom, and 1 bedroom), ceiling fan in every room, large vented skylight, subway tiled bathroom, chrome and brushed stainless-steel fixtures, contemporary IKEA cabinets w/ under-cabinet lighting, dishwasher, gas stove, garbage disposal, kitchen pantry, microwave, and washer/dryer.  Lots of natural light.
There were no shortcuts taken during this 2010 full-gut remodel. Almost everything was replaced and has many refined finishes including: exposed brick, new drywall, fresh paint, overhead and accent lighting, new doors, new wiring, new carpet, new laminate-flooring, new kitchen, new bathroom, and is fully insulated (which is rare for S Philly) with extensive sound-reduction techniques (in floors and interior walls).
This is a unique place.  Everyone loves the place in-person, and it is usually rented on the first showing.  That being said, it is not a large 2-bedroom apt., there isn't outdoor space, it is on the 3rd floor, and the storage areas are limited (to just 2 bedroom closets, the hallway shelving, and kitchen cabinets).  If you're looking for a well-designed place and are not dissuaded by the aforementioned limitations, then please do apply.  While small, the layout is very efficient/thoughtful and this top floor unit is filled with character and light.
Location:  10th and Ellsworth is near South Street, Italian Market, and the Passyunk Ave corridor. It is walking distance to City Hall, Rittenhouse Square, and Old City (etc).
Great things about the neighborhood:
Transport, numerous eateries, coffee shops, bike shops, pharmacies, and grocery stores…
•	Devil’s Den  Bar/Grille http://www.devilsdenphilly.com/ (1 block west)
•	Subway stop is 3 blocks west (Ellsworth St and Broad St)
•	ACME grocery (3 blocks south), Whole Foods (5 blocks north)
•	Garage Bar http://www.garagephilly.com/gallery
•	Ray’s Happy Birthday Bar http://www.thehappybirthdaybar.com/
“Italian Market”  (1-2 blocks, north/east)  http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Italian_Market
•	Gleaner's Cafe Gallery  917 South 9th Street
•	Di Brunos
“Passyunk Square” (3-4 blocks, south)
•	http://www.uwishunu.com/tag/passyunk/
•	http://www.visiteastpassyunk.com/directory.htm
•	Cantina http://www.cantinaloscaballitos.com/
•	B2  Café  http://www.yelp.com/biz/b2-philadelphia
•	The P.O.PE. http://pubonpassyunkeast.com/
“South Street” (5 blocks north)
•	Whole Foods
Finances: Good credit, references, and strong rental history or co-signer required.  First, last, and one month’s security deposit required. Please email with questions and to set up a viewing appointment.
Thanks for looking.  And happy hunting…
-Brendan

description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. title: Beautiful courtyards, Elevator building, On site washer and dryer
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
